text: My favorite 2D Zelda game to date. I've always preferred the 2D games to the 3D ones, with the exception of Wind Waker. Given, I have never played Majora's Mask. But there's just some... charm, I guess, about the 2D Zelda games that really makes it for me... It's hard to explain.

text:
I was born late enough to miss the NES era, but fortunately I was just in time for the "Game Boy on long car trips" era.

For some reason, the sound got on my family's nerves, and I didn't have headphones, so I had to turn the volume down. But I would always hold the speaker up to my ear just to hear this music. Awesome music, awesome game.

The dungeons are pretty fun and the shopkeeper that kills you when you stole was hilarious!
